accueil.title: Explore the <1>properties of numbers</1> interactively
accueil.subtitle: Enter a number and discover its fascinating mathematical properties: divisibility, geometric representations, applications, and much more.
accueil.feature1_desc: Find out which set a number belongs to: integers, rational numbers, real numbers, or others.
accueil.feature2_desc: Understand why a number belongs to a specific set with clear explanations.
accueil.feature3_desc: Learn the basics of mathematical sets and their importance in various contexts.
accueil.step1_desc: Enter an integer or decimal number to start the analysis.
accueil.step2_desc: Discover which mathematical set your number belongs to.
accueil.step3_desc: Receive a detailed explanation of your number's properties and classification.
accueil.ready_subtitle: Join thousands of users discovering math differently with Explo-Math.

analysnum.sous_titre: Enter a number and discover its fascinating mathematical properties: is it prime, even, powerful, magical? Let's explore!
analysnum.invalide: The number must be valid (1 to 1,000,000)

about.description1: Explo-Math is an application owned by the Interuniversity Center for Research in Mathematical Economics (CIREM) of the UPC.
about.description2: CIREM approaches economics with mathematical rigor, showing its commitment to a structured scientific method.
about.description3: Far from limiting itself to immediate or descriptive analysis of economic phenomena, CIREM promotes a cold, essential approach to formalization, characterization, and understanding of underlying mechanisms.
about.description4: The CIREM WPS collection publishes innovative research in fundamental and applied mathematics, ranging from microeconomics and macroeconomics to econometrics, statistics, game theory, and general equilibrium models.
